name: @smile_identity/web-page
description: Self Hosted Integration for Smile Identity on the Web

scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist/js && echo src/js/*.js | xargs -n1 sh -c 'npx terser $1 --mangle --compress --output dist/js/$(basename $1 .js).min.js' argv0 && cp -r dist/js build
scripts.build: npm run instrument && npm run copy
scripts.copy:dist: cp -r src/* dist && cp -r libs dist
scripts.copy: cp -r src/* build && cp -r libs build && cp cypress/pages/*.html build
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run build:dist

author: tams sokari <tams@smileidentity.com>
